[@microsoft/fast-element/di.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [ContainerConfiguration](../fast-element.containerconfiguration/index.html) &gt; [asyncRegistrationLocator](../fast-element.containerconfiguration.asyncregistrationlocator/index.html)

## ContainerConfiguration.asyncRegistrationLocator property

When an asynchronous get request is made to the container, if no resolver is found for the key, this function is called to provide a registration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
asyncRegistrationLocator: AsyncRegistrationLocator;
```
